onBoarding1Desc: Experience cleanliness redefined with our reliable and affordable cleaning solutions.
onBoarding2Desc: Where every detail, from the cozy bedding to the fully-stocked kitchen, is tailored to make you feel right at home.
onBoarding3Desc: Immerse yourself in the luxury of our exclusive offers, crafted with meticulous attention to detail.
getStartDesc: Let's get started on finding your dream job.
signUpDesc: Please fill in the form below to create an account. Easy isn't it?
signUpSuccess: Your account has been set up!
signUpSuccessDecs: We have customized feeds according to your preferences.
forgotPassDesc: Please enter your email address, and we will send you instructions about changing your password.
sendOtp: We have sent 4 digit code on your email to verify you
resetDesc: Your new password must be different from previous used password.
resSuccess: Your password has been successfully reset!
